thread.title: Bye, Bye American Idol Welcome, SuperXtar

author: cbs8
title: Bye, Bye American Idol Welcome, SuperXtar
text:
SuperXtar , an online global singing competition, launches a contest that will award singers and their fans from all over the world with more than half a million US Dollars in Bitcoin prizes.
Dunedin, Florida (PRWEB) October 06, 2015
October 06, 2015- SuperXtar, in union with VrTuo Tv, is launching a talent contest starting November 04, 2015 and will be awarding over half a million US Dollars in Bitcoin prizes to singers and their voting fans.
The contest will be live for one year. The finalists and their companions will be flown from all over the world for the finals in Nashville, Tennessee, with all expenses paid.
In a completely new twist for a talent contest; SuperXtar and sponsor VrTuo Tv , will reward not only the winning singers, but also viewers that vote during the contest.
“Every week we will pick random voters to be awarded thousands of dollars in Bitcoins. We chose Bitcoins because it is easier to pay anyone in the world.” Says George Ruiz, CEO of SuperXtar.
George Ruiz added “Because one of Superxtar's goals is to help unify the world and avoid anything that causes division, we will never, ever mention the contestant's nationality or display any national flags.”
Superxtar.com has been running weekly contests for over a year. Singers can start submitting their videos to the new contest today.
###
SuperXtar has over 114,000 Twitter followers, 13,000 Linkedin connections and 44,000 Facebook fans. WatchVrTuo.com alone racks up 20 million views a month.
 //www.prweb.com/releases/2015/10/prweb13001192.htm
